response.overview: Let the Butter Battle Book begin! The Zooks and the Yooks are at war over the butter and bread - on which side should one spread?  Narrated by the Cat in the Hat, Daisy-Head Mayzie stars young Mayzie McGrew, who wakes up one morning to find a daisy has sprouted from the top of her head. Facing her classmates' taunts and her parents' dismay, Mayzie triumphs at last with the hard-won knowledge that love is more important than fame!  In Horton Hatches the Egg! Horton proves he's an elephant that meant what he said and said what he meant, that he's an elephant faithful - 100%!
response.title: The Best of Dr. Seuss
